data.text:
Trailer for Clerks III, starring Rosario Dawson, Kevin Smith, Jason Mewes, Jeff Anderson and Brian O'Halloran.

After surviving a heart attack, Randal Graves (Jeff Anderson) decides to make a movie with Dante Hicks (Brian O'Halloran) about their lives at the Quick Stop convenience store.
